description: Query a list of DNS Zones
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: QueryDNSZoneList
Return more properties than only the simple list of zones

Order list by defined algorithm, possible values are DNSZONE, CREATEDDATE, UPDATEDDATE, EXPIRATIONDATE, QUERY-QUOTA-PREDICTION, QUERY-QUOTA-COUNT, QUERY-QUOTA-STATUS, PREMIUMDNSCREATEDDATE, PREMIUMDNSEXPIRATIONDATE, PREMIUMDNSCLASS, PREMIUMDNSRENEWALMODE
Parameter to implement a pagination, first will be the start of the list returned
Limit the number of zones returned
Set to 0 to suppress the return of the TOTAL response property. This will impore response time. If set to 1 the TOTAL response property will be returned
Userdepth allows to limit the list inside the usertree
Allows to use a zone name as search pattern
Allows to filter the list for MASTER / SLAVE zones, can be set to MASTER, SLAVE
Search by SOAMNAME
Filter by lowest CREATEDDATE
Filter by highest CREATEDDATE
Filter by lowest UPDATEDDATE
Filter by highest UPDATEDDATE
Filter by lowest EXPIRATIONDATE
Filter by highest EXPIRATIONDATE
Filter list by STATUS of DNSZONE
Additional properties to be returned can be specified here. Currently supported values are:PREMIUMDNS
Only show objects with a PremiumDNS class that matches the pattern specified here.
Only show objects with a PremiumDNS class that matches the regular expression specified here.
Only show objects with a PremiumDNS class that does not match the regular expression specified here.
Show only zones with a certain renewal mode of PremiumDNS.Can beEXPIRE or RENEW
Filter by lowest QUERY-QUOTA-COUNT
Filter by highest QUERY-QUOTA-COUNT
Filter by lowest QUERY-QUOTA-PREDICTION
Filter by highest QUERY-QUOTA-PREDICTION
Filter by QUERY-QUOTA-STATUS, e.g. OK, WARNING, EXCEEDED, SUSPENDED
